Package org.apache.juneau.rest.httppart

Class RequestQueryParam

java.lang.Object
org.apache.juneau.rest.httppart.RequestHttpPart
org.apache.juneau.rest.httppart.RequestQueryParam
All Implemented Interfaces:
org.apache.http.NameValuePair
public class RequestQueryParam
extends RequestHttpPart
implements org.apache.http.NameValuePair
Represents a single query parameter on an HTTP request.

Typically accessed through the RequestQueryParams class.

Some important methods on this class are:

  • RequestQueryParam
    • Methods for retrieving simple string values:
      • asString()
      • get()
      • isPresent()
      • orElse(String)
    • Methods for retrieving as other common types:
      • asBoolean()
      • asBooleanPart()
      • asCsvArray()
      • asCsvArrayPart()
      • asDate()
      • asDatePart()
      • asInteger()
      • asIntegerPart()
      • asLong()
      • asLongPart()
      • asMatcher(Pattern)
      • asMatcher(String)
      • asMatcher(String,int)
      • asStringPart()
      • asUriPart()
    • Methods for retrieving as custom types:
      • as(Class)
      • as(ClassMeta)
      • as(Type,Type...)
      • parser(HttpPartParserSession)
      • schema(HttpPartSchema)
    • Methods for performing assertion checks:
      • assertCsvArray()
      • assertDate()
      • assertInteger()
      • assertLong()
      • assertString()
    • Other methods:
      • getName()
      • getValue()
    • HTTP Parts

    • schema

      public RequestQueryParam schema​(HttpPartSchema value)
      Description copied from class: RequestHttpPart
      Specifies the part schema for this part.

      Used by schema-based part parsers such as OpenApiParser.

      Overrides:
      schema in class RequestHttpPart
      Parameters:

      This object.

    • parser

      public RequestQueryParam parser​(HttpPartParserSession value)
      Description copied from class: RequestHttpPart
      Specifies the part parser to use for this part.

      If not specified, uses the part parser defined on the client by calling RestContext.Builder.partParser().

      Overrides:
      parser in class RequestHttpPart
      Parameters:
      value - The new part parser to use for this part.
      If null, SimplePartParser.DEFAULT will be used.
      Returns:
      This object.
